name: ScreenFlow Document
summary: Learn about .SCREENFLOW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ScreenFlow projects can include transitions, recorded audio, and custom text. Projects can be exported to Flash, YouTube, .MOV files, iPhone video, and other formats.

description: Screen recording project created by ScreenFlow, a desktop screencasting application for Mac OS X; stores a bundle of project files and includes the captured .SCC video file; used for saving and resuming screencasting projects.
